summary: Overpowered Greybeard robe set for all you Destruction monks out there.
descriptionHtml:
My First Mod, been playing with it for a while and got just the way I like. 

Craft under Misc & upgradable both with leather. Nice and easy.

Hood, Robe & boots each add 150% magika regen bonus and 22% destruction casting discount.
Gloves add unarmed bonus for anyone brave or silly enough to run over your fire runes for a close encounter.

All set close to dragonscale armour stats.

Just an ESP, you know what to do with it.
author: gradylile66
